rows.label: tlk41400011_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Ugh... The Nopon just love Samod.
They're always eating Juicy Samod.

rows.label: tlk41400011_03_msg0002
rows.name: You'd get sick of it, right...?

rows.label: tlk41400011_03_msg0003
rows.name:
But there's a way to
solve that problem.

rows.label: tlk41400011_03_msg0005
rows.name:
If the city develops, trade
with other cities will begin.

rows.label: tlk41400011_03_msg0006
rows.name:
New products incorporating the specialties
and local products of other cities
will start lining the shelves.

rows.label: tlk41400011_03_msg0007
rows.name:
Of course... we'll have to secure
trade routes, so we'll probably
need to rely on a Merc Group.
